title: Concurrent Data Transfer with Rust Channels
description: In this lab, we explore message passing as a safe concurrency approach, using channels in Rust's standard library to send and receive data between threads.

meta.title: Concurrent Data Transfer with Rust Channels
meta.description: Learn how to use Rust's message passing and channels for safe concurrency in your programs.
meta.keywords: rust, concurrency, message passing, channels, data transfer
